item.title: Readings
item.description: The table below provides information on the course’s reading assignments, which are taken from the course textbook: Cormen, Thomas, Charles Leiserson, Ronald Rivest, and Clifford Stein. Introduction to Algorithms. 3rd ed. MIT Press, 2009. ISBN: 9780262033848. In addition to the assigned course readings, see the list of useful references for the course below. SESÂ # TOPICS READINGS L1 Administrivia Introduction Analysis of Algorithms, Insertion Sort, Mergesort Chapters 1-2 R1 Correctness of Algorithms
